28 namespace cinder { namespace audio {
29 
31 // This is an abstract base class for implementing platform specific InputDevices
32 class InputDevice {
33  public:
34  typedef uint32_t DeviceIdentifier;
35 
36  virtual ~InputDevice() {}
38  virtual const std::string& getName() = 0;
39  virtual DeviceIdentifier getDeviceId() { return mDeviceId; }
40  protected:
41  InputDevice() {}
42  DeviceIdentifier mDeviceId;
43 };
45 
46 typedef std::shared_ptr<InputDevice> InputDeviceRef;
47 
49 // This is an abstract base class for implementing Input
50 class InputImpl {
51  public:
52  virtual ~InputImpl() {}
53 
54  virtual void start() = 0;
55  virtual void stop() = 0;
56  virtual PcmBuffer32fRef getPcmBuffer() = 0;
57  virtual bool isCapturing() const = 0;
58 
59  virtual uint32_t getSampleRate() const = 0;
60  virtual uint16_t getChannelCount() const = 0;
61  protected:
62  InputImpl( InputDeviceRef aDevice ) {}
63 };
65 
66 class Input {
67  public:
68 
69  Input();
70  Input( InputDeviceRef aDevice );
71  ~Input() {}
72 
74  void start() { mImpl->start(); }
76  void stop() { mImpl->stop(); }
78  PcmBuffer32fRef getPcmBuffer() { return mImpl->getPcmBuffer(); }
80  bool isCapturing() const { return mImpl->isCapturing(); }
82  uint32_t getSampleRate() { return mImpl->getSampleRate(); };
84  uint16_t getChannelCount() { return mImpl->getChannelCount(); };
85 
87  static const std::vector<InputDeviceRef>& getDevices( bool forceRefresh = false );
89  static InputDeviceRef getDefaultDevice();
91  static InputDeviceRef findDeviceByName( const std::string &name );
93  static InputDeviceRef findDeviceByNameContains( const std::string &nameFragment );
94  private:
95  std::shared_ptr<InputImpl> mImpl;
96  public:
98  typedef std::shared_ptr<InputImpl> Input::*unspecified_bool_type;
100  operator unspecified_bool_type() const { return ( mImpl.get() == 0 ) ? 0 : &Input::mImpl; }
101  void reset() { mImpl.reset(); }
103 };
104 
105 class InputExc : public Exception {};
106 class InvalidDeviceInputExc : public InputExc {};
107 
108 }} //namespace
